name: f9d82970-16f0-5921-adf9-6d13feac48fa
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Vavihill, Sweden (20100101 - 20140101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Vavihill, Sweden (20100101 - 20140101)
